name: Free Maps for Minecraft PE - Pocket Edition Pro
name_original: Free Maps for Minecraft PE - Pocket Edition Pro
description:
Install MCPE's world maps on your ios device is now easy than ever with Maps for Minecraft PE (Pocket edition)

Browse map you like, then press Download, and you can use itunes or ifile copy map file to Minecraft game. Then you can switch to Minecraft and enjoy your downloaded map from world list.

FEATURES:
- Many categories to choose
+ Adventure maps
+ Creation maps
+ CTM maps
+ Minigame maps
+ Parkour maps
+ Puzzle maps
+ PvP maps
+ Redstone maps
+ Roller Coaster maps
+ Survival maps
- Many famous map types.
- Support various MCPE version from 0.13.x, 0.14.x, 0.15.x
- Complete guide and support.
- You can submit your own map.
- Weekly update with tons of new maps.

ATTENTION:

This application does use the internet to load new data, so please be aware of data usage!

This is an unofficial application for Minecraft Pocket Edition. This application is not affiliated in any way with Mojang AB. The Minecraft Name, the Minecraft Brand and the Minecraft Assets are all property of Mojang AB or their respectful owner. All rights reserved. In accordance with http://account.mojang.com/documents/brand_guidelines
